tagline: Know your state. Take one next step.
description: MindSense AI is a physiology-aware readiness and regulation platform for focused work and recovery.

hero.headline: Know your state. Take one next step.
hero.subheadline: Track readiness, load, and consistency, then run guided regulation protocols that protect recovery and focused output.
hero.trustLine: Works with Apple Watch and Apple Health

outcomes.title: Clarity
outcomes.description: Know your current state without guesswork.

outcomes.title: Action
outcomes.description: Run one protocol in minutes with clear guidance.

outcomes.title: Consistency
outcomes.description: Build recovery and focus stability over time.

productPreview.title: Today
bullets: Readiness, load, and consistency in one command view.
One recommendation with confidence and rationale.

productPreview.title: Regulate
bullets: Guided session flow with pacing cues and timers.
Post-session impact check-in to learn what works.

productPreview.title: Data
bullets: Trend visibility across readiness and load.
7-day experiments with adherence and effect context.

differentiators: Scenario-driven recommendations, not generic wellness tips.
Estimate + rationale transparency so users understand why.
7-day experiments that validate personal response patterns.
Confidence and coverage framing to prevent false certainty.
Low-friction protocol UX designed for high-stress moments.
Clear safety boundaries and escalation guidance.
proofPoints: Built for individuals who need calm, practical decisions.
Built for operators and founders managing cognitive load.
Pilot-ready for performance teams and coaching groups.
Trust-focused design with privacy and safety controls.

productPillars.title: Today
productPillars.summary: State snapshot and one next best step.

faq.question: What signals are used?
faq.answer: MindSense uses wearable-adjacent state signals, check-ins, and protocol outcomes to generate practical readiness guidance.

faq.question: How are recommendations decided?
faq.answer: The app matches current pattern context to a scenario, then surfaces one best next protocol with rationale and confidence framing.

faq.question: What if confidence is low?
faq.answer: MindSense indicates lower confidence and prompts additional context capture rather than overstating recommendation certainty.

faq.question: Is this medical care?
faq.answer: No. MindSense AI is a wellness support product and not emergency or diagnostic medical care.

faq.question: Can teams use it?
faq.answer: Yes. Teams can run structured 4–6 week pilots with adoption support and outcome reporting.

protocols.name: Calm Now
protocols.when: Acute stress spikes or emotional overactivation
protocols.immediate: Downshift arousal and restore cognitive control
protocols.week: More reliable recovery after stress events

protocols.name: Focus Prep
protocols.when: Before deep work or cognitively demanding blocks

protocols.name: Sleep Downshift
protocols.when: Evening wind-down or elevated pre-sleep load

valueProps: Improve consistency and reduce burnout-risk patterns.
Convert stress awareness into concrete daily actions.
Support adoption with low-friction protocol workflows.
Generate pilot-ready outcomes and implementation guidance.
pilot: Week 2–4: usage, adoption coaching, and check-ins
Week 5–6: outcomes review and rollout recommendation

privacy: Collect only data needed for guidance and learning loops.
User controls for export and deletion.
security: Operational access controls with minimal privilege.
